name: stephanie vines
text: My second visit in two weeks and same rude service. If you are talking with a customer you should never interrupt them to ring up another customer. The items are amazing but I refuse to go to a place where I can’t even finish my order because a “VIP” person walked in. It would be different if it were just a quick hand off and he pre-payed but not the case. I am stopped mid sentence and then have to wait for him to pay and then order something else. As though making items don’t already take 10-15 minutes. That makes my visit even longer as well as ruins my mood for the start of my morning. I’d rather go to a competitor across town. And I used to come few months ago and it was always great, quick service. Definitely not the same.

name: Ashley Terral
text:
I just can't say enough positive things about this place, from the extremely helpful staff, to the
cleaniliness of the establishment, the awesome owners, and don't forget the best juice
EVER!

I used The Juicery as my main source of nutrition for a 25 day fast. I was desparately needing
healing on a cellular level in my gut. I ordered the juice every 3 days and I received my order
every time with little to no hiccups. The owners even left for vacation and were communicating
with me from paradise when I had questions.

Not to mention, juicing from home 4-5 times a day is so laborious and time consuming...

This is the fourth time I've done a juice fast for this long, but the first one I've done outside
of my home. This time was different. There was hardly any hunger, no crankiness or headaches.
I was able to sleep at night and I had amazing energy. Through this fast, I did lose 20 lbs in 20
days but that certainly was not the reason for doing it. The doctor wanted to put me on 20 days
of antibiotics. So, was this expensive? It wasn't cheap but it was an investment for my health
and much better for my body than taking so many antibiotics. I did see the doctor halfway through
and they were very impressed with the outcome and my vitals.

I even called them on the day I started back to solid foods because my  yoga teacher training graduating
class was celebrating at the Mexican restaurant. The Juicery made sure I had something raw and vegan and
healthy to take with me so I could be included in the celebration.

I've been off the fast for about ten days. I crave the juice like I wouldn't have ever imagined. Since
I came off, I've decided to be vegan and gluten free for a while and it's working wonderfully for me!

I truly believe that the fresh Almond Milk from The Juicery and the Cold Pressed juice changed my
life! I look forward to working with them in the future to help fulfill my juicing needs! Everyone who
works there is so helpful. I love the owners, the vision, and the concept. Thank you so much for
helping me to change my life, live a healthier lifestyle, and do it with ease!

name: Tara Dixon
text:
Placed an order for anniversary and it was suppose to be delivered today April 16, 2021. When I called the store, worker said it was in transit. Arrangement never arrived.

I expect a full refund first thing in the morning. If they couldn’t provide the service why take my money and then lie like it’s in transit.

Adding insult to injury, Cory Lewis, if that’s even his name called the recipient to say that the delivery address was outside of their delivery zone. However, no one called this morning to say that was the case, and even when I called at 4:49 pm, the woman who answered did not state this, she said the delivery was in transit.

Then to put icing on the cake, Cory Lewis called me to say they tried to deliver the order but the man didn’t expect the order, there was no man at the address all day and someone was literally sitting home waiting on the order all day. Then he tried to add yet another lie to that.

Professionalism and truthfulness is not a big ask when doing business, this placed missed big. I expect a refund and a call from management.

name: Kent Whitaker
text:
Horrible experience. My wife and I are not in Auburn so we chose this company to deliver an arrangement for Valentines Day for my mother-in-law in Opelika. We ordered a higher dollar item other than the lower priced special. Specifically for the reason of having more fruit and less chocolate as we were hoping for something a bit healthier because of health issues. They charged our credit card for the higher priced item we ordered but delivered the lower price special with added chocolate and it was a smaller item. In addition to the wrong item - they did not deliver it on Valentines Day. We called several times and they acted nice at first and promised to deliver the item the next day. Late in the day mom called and said it was never delivered. We called back and it was being delivered late in the day - a day late - and it was the wrong item, not the higher priced one we paid for.

We called again and one of the employees admitted they went to the wrong house on Valentines day so somebody got the higher priced item. My wife called again to at least get a refund for the overcharged amount or to have the right item delivered. We were promised the right item would be delivered. The next day, no delivery.

At this point, several days after Valentines Day my wife gave up so I started calling, was promised a refund or a deliver of the right item. There was no refund or proper delivery. I was then promised at least a call back from the owner, then another promise, another promised call back. I never heard back.

My mother in law never received the correct item and and we never got the refund. We finally tried to cancel payment with credit card and to get a refund but they disputed it - said that the item was delivered. Did not mention that it was the wrong item, and that it was late, missing Valentines Day. I'm sorry that they delivered the item, possibly twice, to the wrong house, and then the wrong item to the right address. That's three deliveries, three trips, three items. However, those mistakes are not our fault. All I know is that my mother in law never received what was ordered.

I would not recommend this company to another person.

I would probably have written a different review if the owner would have called me back as promised by the several employees.

I called several times, contacted via the live chat and email on website, had an automated reply sent with my “case number” saying I’d be contacted by the store. Never was. 3 days later on Monday I finally got someone on the phone and all she said was “yeah i don’t even what happened with that order haha. Do you want me to send it today?” (Never even got an apology or any type of discount offer or even an explanation) 4 days after her birthday? ummm yeah, no thanks. Never again. text: Wish I could give 5 stars because the smoothie was good, staff was very friendly and helpful,  place is very clean, ingredients seem fresh. But.. 9.70 for the small option with protein is way overpriced. I like to support local businesses but not willing to pay that everytime.

resp.text: Ty for your feedback and glad you enjoyed your smoothie and was taken care of. Yes we get a produce order just about every other day, sometimes every day. We do Not use concentrated liquids or canned goods. We have many options for base instead of just water. Other options; almond milk, oat milk, coconut milk, coconut water, etc and have many options for protein as well. We use Real fruits and veggies-it’s not broken down into a powder.Also, you can create your own or substitute any ingredients on the menu.  I’m sorry you feel that it’s costly, but it is costly to use Real ingredients. We do offer discounts to gym members (with proof of membership), military , and 1st responders. We also offer our loyalty reward program which is a big savings.. our customers are most important and we want to help keep the community healthy. It does cost money to be healthy but more to be sick. If you haven’t signed up for the loyalty reward program, I highly recommend. Ty and look forward to seeing you again.

text:

And honestly just like I'd make a smoothie at home. I find most places make ultra sweet ones, and use more compotes than fresh fruit.

text: Im from about 50 miles away and I recently stopped by The Juice Shack and even brought a friend wanting to try the Boba options there. So I ask the lady if I should come early to get a juice next time and she looks at me and said “yeah” turns around and walks off. I’m shook. Like why go out of your way to be rude to the people who support your small business?

resp.text: I’m just as upset as you are. I do apologize and will find out why they told you that. We close at 7, meaning the juicer isn’t broken down until 7. I appreciate y’all coming in and the feedback to let me know. Our customers are #1. I do apologize if anyone was rude. Please come back and ask for me, Mechau Mowbray or call the Juice Shack  and they’ll give you my contact. Again, I do apologize you had to travel a good distance and not get what you wanted.

name: Carrie Rollwagen
text:
The Pantry is a really lovely place to spend a meal or pick up quick, fresh food. Each day, they make fantastic meals out of organic, really healthy local food. It's true that some of the entrees can be kind of small, but the staff is really familiar with their menu, and they're honest about which meals are filling and which are lighter. The best thing is to let the staff know what you're in the mood for and ask them about their favorites (it's how I was introduced to their tomato tart, which is really outstanding).

The Pantry also makes fresh juice, and it all tastes amazing. I haven't studied the long-term benefits of juicing, but I know the juices here are delicious and make me feel great, so that's good enough for me. You can buy juice made that day out of the cooler or order something specific made while you wait.

This place is all about special little touches. The restaurant itself is small and incredibly charming, and they'll do things like serve free goat cheese samplers sometimes or serve cucumber water to add something special to every visit.

The Pantry also has a big selection of jams, cheeses, wine, beer and specialty items that make great treats or gifts for foodies. I haven't tried The Pantry for their waffle bar yet, but it's on my list after reading the other reviews.

text: Was a lovely place before I found out how ruthless the owner is. Absolutely disgusted and infuriated with the owner firing such a joyous person who ran the store perfectly. This place is no longer the same. Take your business elsewhere. Oh how I wish to give a zero star rating.

name: No Business
text: I frequented this business every single day because of the wonderful woman who worked up front. She was kind and knowledgable and helpful to literally everyone who came in. Many customers even thought she owned the store. Then I learned that she was never paid, for a years worth of work every single day from 5:30AM - 6:30 PM 7 days a week. I was mad, but she was happy where she was. This was the woman all other reviews are referencing. Recently, she was fired without reason and the store closed for “remodeling” i. e. hiring new employees since the owner had never actually had any for more than a few months at a time. Now, I refuse to shop at a store with such a terrible owner. Refusing to pay workers then firing them without reason all the while making profits off their labor is essentially servitude, which is unacceptable. Please take your business to Northport Nutrition or T town Nutrition, both of whom have very similar menus and much more welcoming staff. :) and no, she didn’t have to ask me to write this review nor do I have a vendetta against anybody working in the store currently, just can’t fathom giving business to a woman who so cruelly treated her loyal employee and supposed friend.

name: Alisha Miles
text: Delicious doesn't begin to describe the food. We ordered lunch and dinner to-go as we were passing through the town. The Kale wrap and Jack fruit BBQ sandwich are our top picks. Not only does this place offer amazing food, they are in this specific location to give back to their home community by offering healthy food. A great mission accompanied by delicious food and awesome service. I will be back soon even if I have to drive out of the way.... I may even plan a trip just to eat here again!

name: Duzle
text: The café itself is quaint and chill, and the lady who runs it is charming and lively! Street parking. The location is within their home community, to which they wish to give back by providing a healthy alternative such as this. I had the "millionaire 'burger'" along with sweet potato fries - quite tasty! It was piled high with veggies, avocado, and other add-ons. The burger look and texture was great. As usual with meat substitutes, you must treat it as a new kind of "meat" rather than compare it to actual beef. If you do this and let it stand on its own, this burger (along with other substitutes) tastes great. Next time I'm here, I want to try the jackfruit "pulled pork" and possibly a smoothie. This was my first vegan restaurant experience and it was quite lovely! Highly recommended for those hesitant on exploring this new type of cuisine.

text: I've been here twice and each time was a pleasant experience. If you are in a rush, call in your order. The Happy Feelings Tropical Good Smoothie is the best. I've also tried the pulled pork sandwich which was surprisingly good if you're not vegan. Check them out for good healthy food.

name: Tim Harris
text: WOAH! What a disappointment... if you have no appetite or you eat like fashion model. This might be good. Portions are small *like half of a sandwich... and there "large" is like a medium anywhere else I have been.  Their fruit bowls look large but, I didn't get that.  I got a piddly bit for quite a lot.

resp.text: Hey Tim, very sorry you had a bad experience. As you can imagine sourcing all organic premium ingredients can be expensive. Hopefully you’ll give us another shot to make it right. Thanks for the feedback.

name: Lee Reese
text: Lovely little juice bar with a great menu of healthy, organic foods, smoothies and juices. The staff is super friendly and helped my make a good choice since it was my first time. Indoor and outdoor seating available and they have an app so you can order on the go.

name: Christine Golab
text: Protein toast was ON POINT! Also love the salads and all the juices and milks! I would love to add a photo, but I ate it too fast 😁

resp.text: Hey Christine, glad you liked it!

name: Nicole Havel
text:
I will say the food is delicious and clean and the juices are great. The building is spotless, and the workers are nice.
However, I asked for both my juices to be light ice or no ice (I don’t like ice). I proceeded to be charged $5.50 more for each juice, totaling $14.25 per juice. I had ordered two juices and a toast, and, with a 25% tip, my total came out to $50. I was like excuse me? I asked for a receipt and was like there’s no way I’m paying $5.50 extra each drink for asking for light ice/no ice. Just give me less juice. So ultimately I had to ask for a refund. $8.75 is a lot for a juice to begin with so to put it bluntly don’t come here on a budget.
I cook solely organic / grass fed / free range food. I know the costs are higher, but not that high. This place is a racket.

resp.text: Hey Nicole, we’re glad you like the food and the shop. As you know, premium organic food is expensive to source but it is the best for your health. Thanks for the feedback about extra juice pricing. Unfortunately that is what it costs us. I’ll be sure to reiterate with our team to make sure guests know there’s an added cost for that.

name: William Brend
text: Absolutely fresh and delicious!!  Definitely recommend the Hardcore One if you love your veggies in a juice.

resp.text: Thanks! Glad you liked it!!

name: b H
text: I’ve had a pleasant experience each time I’ve visited the Greystone location. The interaction was very minimal but nice enough. I’m definitely hooked and have decided to make Clean Juice a part of my daily routine.

name: Lorenzo Carter
text: Im sad to complain that today was the first bad experience I've had at Clean Juice. I reported the incident to the manager Savanah, to no avail. Usually when entering the store its very pleasant and warm. Today when I came in it was very different. The lady at the register appeared to be annoyed and upset. She never asked if she could help me, she didn't speak, no smile or anything. She didn't say anything to me until I asked her a question about the menu. I don't know her name but she stood out to me because she was the only tall black young lady working. I told the manager it was frustrating to me because being a black man myself, i didn't expect to be treated that way by her. I have always been treated so nice and warm any other time I come in the store. I have written the corporate office and will follow up with them as soon as possible because after talking to the manager Savanah she let me know that her friendship with her employee was very strong...which let me know that I should not hold my breath for an apology.

name: Jennifer Pidgeon
text: Today was my first visit to Clean Juice off 280.  I had the Longevity One smoothie, and it was really good and filling.  I bought some cold-pressed juices that I can't wait to try.  The staff was friendly and knowledge about the ingredients and health benefits.  I'm looking forward to trying the Greenoa Bowls, wraps, and toasts.  I will definitely go back and do recommend it.

resp.text: Hey thanks for coming in! Glad you liked it. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Amy Farren
text: I got "The Spring One" smoothie, and it tasted like frozen water essentially. I thought I was getting Covid or something when I tried it, because there was no taste. Then I tried my son's Berry Bowl, and it was delicious. I have no problem paying high prices for organic food, but I would for it to at least taste good. I guess I just won't ever order their smoothies and stick to the acai bowls.

name: Ann Elizabeth Moore
text: I loved Clean Juice from the moment we stepped inside! The atmosphere is great. The juices and smoothies are stellar. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Hey Ann, thanks for the kind words.

name: Melyssa Boggan
text: Great atmosphere 😄 everyone is kind and seemed very friendly. Love the music playing. Everything looked so fresh (fruits and veggies). Juice and smoothie were delicious!!!

resp.text: Thanks Melyssa! Glad you liked it.

name: Jessica Hose
text: The store was immaculate and love the worship music playing. The girls were so sweet and made our product perfect! Thank God for a truly healthy food in Greystone. I will be back for sure!

resp.text: Thanks Jessica!!

name: David Aaron Sheetz
text: DO NOT GO HERE IF YOU VALUE COVID-19 PRECAUTIONS. First I'll start with saying they have a sign that specifically asks for Yelp and Google reviews so here you go! The two employees working were both maskless this specific time I visited Clean Juice. I have been here on and off throughout the pandemic and have seen masks being worn sometimes and not others...Why can't this place enforce the ONE THING that scientists have PROVEN is effective? Why can't they stay consistent with their policies? This is grade A poor business management. Also there is a statewide mandate still active. USE LOGIC AND REASON OR LOSE MY BUSINESS. Food is great, don't kill your business by failing your employees and customers.

resp.text:
Hey David,
Our policy is for employees to wear masks. We will continue to have this policy until the governor drops the mandate. Thanks for feedback.

name: Dawn Willett
text: The coffee smoothie was delicious. The staff is very friendly.

resp.text: Thanks Dawn!

name: Michael Johnson
text: Amazing atmosphere every time I come in. The staff is always friendly and professional! I have told all of my friends and coworker about Clean Juice!!!

resp.text: Thank you! We’re happy to serve.

name: Steven Mooney
text: Friendly staff and delicious smoothies and juices.  I didn't try the food, but The Coffee One and The Intense One were both great.

resp.text: Thanks! Glad you enjoyed it!!

name: Satin Touch Experience
text: You better be ready for those shots oh my they help clean you out

name: Vinny
text: Their product is excellent, but pricey.  They are limiting their potential with a lot of the “in your face” religious stuff scattered throughout the store.  This is off-putting to a lot of people and getting even more so.   The employees are very nice and friendly, the store is immaculate and the product is great.  If they make it more middle of the road, (No “hey, look at me I’m a Christian” and some $5 or less options, customers would be lined up out the door.

name: Max Messer
text: I have had nothing but fantastic experiences at this location! The management is wonderful and always so friendly and welcoming. They remember my order and always suggest the best things on the menu with a great knowledge of all of the ingredients. I will definitely be coming back here as a regular!

name: Dr. Rebecca Warren
text: Just drove by here on a trip back home and we had such a great experience! The team of women working were so nice and very attentive. We appreciated their patience as I asked for multiple things out of the ordinary. Will be back!

name: Melissa McCollum
text: Love the smoothies and the customer service is excellent!

resp.text: Thanks Melissa!

name: Savannah Irwin
text: I love the atmosphere at Clean Juice. The staff and team at this location know how to make their guests feel welcome. The quality of the products is set apart, as well as the quality of the service provided. Love this store!!

name: Natalya Drake
text: Great customer service, amazing drinks, I’m so thankful I live close to them.

resp.text: Thank you so much!! Glad you enjoyed it.

name: Shaundra Hudson
text: Love this place.  I literally used to drive to Huntsville, Al to get my juice cleanses.  So excited they are down the street. Juices are fresh and staff is amazing.  You cannot go wrong here, everything is healthy and organic.

resp.text: Hello Sha, we used to drive to Huntsville and Atlanta weekly too!! Now we have great juice right in our back yard. Thanks for the kind words and valuable feedback.

name: Richard Baxter
text: Our new favorite place! Organic and healthy juices and meals, a great atmosphere and friendly people, and a strong mission to bring health and wellness to their customers. Our whole family including the kids love their juices and smoothies and bowls. We will make this a regular stop during our week!

resp.text: Hello Richard, Thanks so much for your kind words! We're so glad to be part of the community and provide a healthy option to our area. Look forward to seeing you and your family!

name: Megan Hudson
text: hands down the best place to work💛 (and eat! can’t go wrong with anything!)

name: Troy Gigis
text: My family and I are so happy that you all are open. Your staff made a big difference in my experience. Everyone was so eager to help and kind. We love the cold press juices and your smoothies are excellent. We will keep coming back.

resp.text: Hey Troy, Thanks so much for coming in! So glad our team made you feel welcome, they are awesome. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Alisa Poole
text: Love love love your food and juices!!!

resp.text: Thanks Alisa! Glad you like it.

name: Nicholas Gregory
text: Wow what a staff! First time here, walked me through everything and gave recommendations. The owner of this location is very lucky to have this level of employees.

name: Marissa Miller
text: Had been a few times before the pandemic and the manager always was able to help me and describe why certain things are good for me and helped me greatly with learning what to put into my body. He always made good conversation and made me feel important and like they cared about my health. I came back the other day after learning they reopened and had a horrible experience. I asked about nutritional benefits and differences in proteins and they just tried to hand me a nutritional pamphlet and could not answer any specific questions about their products . I asked to speak to the man I normally spoke to and that he was the manager and I couldn’t remember his name.I was informed he was fired and I was talking to one of the managers who took his place. She was maybe 15-17 which makes no sense to me. She had no clue what she was talking about with regards to their menu and did not really help me at all and seemed angry that I was asking so many questions. After I finally ordered she left for another employee to make my smoothie and even the employee joked and  said don’t worry we miss our manager too! I laughed but was also semi shocked by that. I Was a regular now I will not be back.

resp.text: Hey Marissa, we are so sorry you didn't have a good experience. While we strive to always be able to answer the questions our guests need, many times our team may have to reference a guide book to give the proper answer. I believe we are all a little rusty as we navigate opening back up after all the craziness hit. Our goal is to always be learning. Again, we are sorry you had a negative experience and we do hope to see you back in in the future. If you do decide to come back in (which we hope you do), your next one will be on us.

name: Brad Louis
text: This place has gone way downhill since they reopened. It was great when they first opened always had good service, so I don’t know what happened maybe they changed management.

name: Alda Her
text: I love this place ❤️🥰 they have wonderful juices, smoothies and salads!! Always the friendliest service and delicious, healthy food choices. My goal is to try EVERYTHING on the menu 😂

resp.text: Hello Alda, Thanks so much for the kind words and feedback. If you need some help choosing what to try next, let us know. We're happy to help.

name: Erika VM
text:
Im very disappointed. I’m in 50s and trying so hard to stay healthy and keep my mask on in public. Where I live in AL, today we had the highest COVID spike on record. None of your three servers had masks and looked oblivious to my question (polite) why they didn’t. We are in the middle of a pandemic. I stated this concern on their ig and they blocked me. As they say below, posting on their ig concerns is not in their opinion acceptable. As any business knows,  social media is where people can comment positive or negative concerns. If companies delete anything that is not glowing it shows a refusal to truly address customer concerns. Why not publicly state your official policies. Any successful co will allow feedback —good or bad— so long as it’s not vulgar.  This refusal to care about customers health,  and then to not reply reasonably to feedback is not acceptable. There is no admission in your reply to me that there is any policy re this public health matter. Im appalled as a franchise that you allow this and I’m quite upset. I was a regular but no more. It appears that teenagers unmasked are calling the shots. If you are in the food industry in AL and watching the news you need to realize that this is unsafe.These unmasked kids have parents and grandparents and can be asymptomatic and pass it on to them, others and your customers. The employee stated “we don’t have to wear them.”  You are now saying they do?? It’s not clear. Did you change your policies yesterday? Was the employee making that up? For a store that prides itself on health, this is the biggest health crisis we have faced as a country in many many years.
This was the Greystone store in AL .

resp.text: Hello Erika, Thank you so much for your feedback. I'm sure you're aware that an Instagram post about our new app isn't the best place to give feedback about masks. Thats why the comments were deleted. Thank you for bringing your feedback here. Our staff has been wearing masks for most of the time since we've reopened and we will continue to wear masks as long as people are concerned over this matter.

name: Leslie Dollar
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PLACE! Everything is fresh and delicious, very high quality ingredients.  Staff is super helpful and nice.  Fabulous addition to Greystone area.

resp.text: Hey Leslie, Thanks so much for your awesome feedback! We're super happy you came in and hope to see you again real soon.

name: Leah Velasco
text: AHHH there was a problem with my money and basically they were so nice and reassuring 😭😭😭😭😭 sweetest thing ever omg

name: Brian Smith
text: Jeremiah, Monique, and the team at Clean Juice are committed to building long term relationships with their customers by exceeding expectations and getting to know people. If you are looking to transform your health I recommend that you visit Clean Juice today!

name: William Atchley
text: Everything I've gotten has been great and taste so fresh!

name: Richard Bowman
text: Awesome fresh made juices and salads. Wonderful staff, knowledgeable and friendly.

resp.text: Hey Richard, Thanks so much for coming and providing such great feedback! We can't wait to see you again soon.

name: Dr. Jessica All Natural Family Doc

text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent alternative

name: Nathaniel White

name: Liz robloxz
text: I love the atmosphere and helpful staff. The best place for tea in this area! New to town so very glad to have found this beautiful place!

name: Paula Fuller
text: Love their Tea drinks. So much better than others I have tried out.

name: Jami Finley
text: Very friendly service and awesome drinks.

name: Jessica Powell
text: This place is probably the worse tea I have had the girl filled the cup to the top with water then added the flavor back home they do the protein flavor and whatever else you may want or ask for then add ice and water if I had wanted a flavored water I could’ve went to the shell station it would’ve been a lot cheaper just horrible I won’t be back to this place

name: Debbie Dickert
text: My whole family loves this place and they also treat you like family a big shout-out to Sean and Tiffany

name: cindy douglass

name: Lesley Thigpen
text: Great service!

name: Tyler Hankins
text: Shawn was such a nice guy! Will definitely be going back!

name: Dustin Coan
text: Try the tea bombs!

name: Neshia Pages
text: Love their shakes

name: Daryl Moon
text: Friendly staff!

name: Kim Santos
text: Love it

name: Adrian Mines
text: I ordered my mother in law a dozen of doughnut rings ( green apple) with a bouquet of balloons ( mothers day)... well she received the rings which were left on the porch but no balloons.  When I called the manager she informed me they couldn't get any balloons out for 3 days or refund my money 😒.  I wanted my mother in law to have the balloons so she got them 3 days later. They were accompanied by a half dozen chocolate covered strawberries 🍓hence the 2 stars given. Customer service is EVERYTHING especially in these days.  I would do edible arrangements again but definitely at another location.

resp.text: Adrian, we apologize. Our mission is to always deliver the best possible customer service experience and we’re so sorry we fell short. We want to make this right. Please send us your order information at orderteam@edible.com.

name: Da Don Eric O
text: Very good Customer service. Very diligent at Expediting orders. Everytime I place a order it's just as I requested A1

resp.text: Hello, thanks so much for shouting out our team! We will be sure to pass this along to the store. We love our store owners and how they’re able to help everyone celebrate their special occasions! .

name: Angel Loveless
text: I ordered the Mother’s Day treat box and it did not come in the box shown when ordering, I received 4 cookies not 6 like it said it would have, then instead of 2 mini cheesecakes I got 1 and a brownie, the strawberries did not have the Mother’s Day chocolate piece on top like the description stated. Very unhappy, when a person orders something they expect it to be as shown and as the description states.

name: Chelevia Thompson
text: Perfect example of great customer service and friendly staff! Went out of their way to get my 12 yr daughter an arrangement!

name: Richard Munoz
text: Very helpful. Very kind. Mother's day win!

name: Vance Torres
text:
They lie. They told me they weren't taking order anymore at 2pm. That i could schedule an order for the next day.  The person I was getting them for went online and placed the order.  So now she thinks I lied to avoid getting it.
So if you call and they lie just place your order online. Customer service is garbage.

name: Latonya Finkley
text: One of the Best gifts to give a person for any occasion...Customer Service is always "awesome" and the fruits are always fresh.

name: Tracy Mills
text: I am not one to give reviews but this was one of the worst customer services experiences I've ever had.  I ordered this for an employee to be delivered on their work anniversary.  It is 2 days later and it was never delivered.  They said they attempted delivery and now it needs to be picked up in store.  I will never order from this location again.

name: Lisa Cunningham
text: Called and ask if they had pre-made arrangement, I picked up @hwood store, was beautiful and tasty♥️

name: Colby Lane

name: overworkedcop

name: Starry Jones
text: If I could  give zero stars I would  this location  was so unprofessional, the fruit was old and smelling. The manager admitted to the fruit being over ripe but wouldn't give me a refund nor send another arrangement and demanded pics like I was lying. They are too high to be sending out old fruit and bad customer service

name: Pastor Deon Howard
text: Placed an order for my wife that was delivered quickly, the presentation was awesome and the fruit was fresh and delicious. I have never had a bad experience with this company and will continue to support them.

name: Andy Marbutt
text: I made an order online and somehow it got sent to another location. The staff at this location went above and beyond to help me. They were super friendly and helpful.

name: Nicole Thomas
text: I ordered online Monday Feb 9th to have delivered to my husband's wk. Extremely easy online order & Exceptional delivery!! Fruit was fresh, ripe, & tasty. We're still enjoying the fruit 3 days later! A bit pricey with double delivery charge, but it was Valentine's. Busiest day of yr probably. I would recommend this to anyone.

name: Bernice Bunkley
text: Received  Chocolate covered  Strawberries. The strawberry was not sweet.

name: Kasey Bodine
text: I needed my delivery to meet a certain time frame and changed same day. I called and they made it happen within the hour! Very thankful for great customer service!

name: Purrito 38
text: Great workers nice and friendly and I love the smell

name: Shaprecious Mcgruder
text: I live in GA and I wanted to do something special for my Aunt's birthday in Bessemer. I placed my order online at 1:14pm swear to God I got a confirmation at 2:56 pm saying it had been delivered! I was in shock. I thought " oh maybe they did a crappy job" or " maybe the left out my additional items" NOPE! She loved it and the personal note. Thank Thank You!

name: Kyle Partridge
text: Set up a pick up for 10:30 and used my 30 minute break to go get it and bring it to my girlfriend for her birthday. Got here at 10:30 only to be told it wouldn't be ready for another 10 minutes and I wasn't the happiest but I understood and went to wait in my car. Sat in my car for another 20 minutes before I had to go back inside to check and see how much longer it was going to be. So not only was it not on time I am now late for work and I won't even get to bring it to her for her birthday while she is at work. Terrible customer service. If you schedule a time it should be done at the time not whenever it suits the workers.

name: Ben Tonner
text: Placed the order online and used a coupon. It was ready before the time I requested which was really nice. Overall very happy

name: Pam Braswell

name: Michael Fagin
text: Great customer service on 7/19/2016.  In addition to my online pickup, I ordered a smoothie and it was made with fresh fruits.  Highly recommend this store!

name: Shedrick Flowers
text: Way over-hyped!! Save yourself some money and head to any supermarket to buy your own fruit and play around with arranging it. The presentation just wasn't all that great for the money.

name: King Williams
text: They don’t feel like doing it today but done it last time if people money not good can u just close are let s business that want to make money do it please ughhh y’all really suck the lady sound rude why say u Delivered if you don’t want to deliver.

name: jarvis Wright
text: Amazing service & food!

name: Chelsee Farwell
text: Worst customer service ever. I live out of state and for my sisters 16th birthday we wanted to do something special for her so we decided to have an edible arrangement with balloons delivered to her high school. 72$ later they didn't deliver the balloons and when I called to get a refund for the balloons a man named Bryant answered the phone. I really just would have been fine if they were apologetic towards the situation and cared but instead in a monotone voice the response I was given was "well sometimes we miss things, do you have the card so I can refund the money". Outstanding response sir. Needless to say I told them my fiancé would call them with the card information. When he called the owner answered and again was not very sympathetic to the situation. He decided a refund wouldn't matter since the surprise for her birthday was ruined anyways. She had the balloons delivered the next day that we paid for already and a box of 6 complementary strawberries sent with it. At the end of the day if someone in this business would have ACTED like they cared that their business took away from what should have been a special sweet 16th birthday delivery I wouldn't have such a bad taste in my mouth for this company.

name: Michele Coco
text: The customer service at this franchise is HORRIBLE. the manager, Rebecca, had a horrible attitude, as did the delivery driver,  and made what was supposed to be an awesome gift a pain to receive.  I almost called back to tell them to cancel the delivery entirely and to credit the person who sent me the gift.  I was not home for the initial delivery at noon on Wednesday. I was left a message on my cell phone by the delivery man to call the store to reschedule. I called, was placed on hold and then REbecca picked up giving me some stupid line of, "They are a very busy company and cannot schedule a delivery in  set period of time." I then proceeded to ask her if I was supposed to wait here all day to receive my bouquet. She said no, I could come pick it up. They would try to make sure the bouquet was at the store when I arrived. So, wait?  You can't get it to me in a 2 ot 4 hour time period and then you will try to have it there, all the way across town, should I happen to show up?  WHAT?  How is it that FedEx, UPS and even the USPS can deliver things nationwide but this little mom/pop business that serves the Birmingham metro (population 1.5million) cannot get it together to deliver a bouquet in a 2 to 4 hour time slot?  PATHETIC.

name: Lala M
text: Placed an online order. They called and stated they couldn't deliver until tomorrow. They have 5 hours before they close so why not? I originally tried to place an order earlier this morning and they couldn't deliver to the address I requested bc it was 2 miles outside of their delivery area. Ridiculous!!!

name: Michael Hickman

name: Eme U
text: This place was better than expected. I've been looking for a place that sells healthier options and I've finally found it. I had the kale-licious smoothie and the chicken pesto wrap. The wrap had flavor y'all! Plus you could tell the lettuce was fresh because I kept crunching on it. You can't say that about a lot of healthy food places. Also my smoothie had very little sugar, which I was very happy about. As a girl with a big appetite, I was surprised how the food filled me up. I highly recommend!

name: Timothy Johnson
text: Really enjoy this place. Healthy food! And I love their wellness shot, has some kick to it, but it sure does the job!

name: Camaron Kelley

Great service and already remembering my regular order.  I'm so glad to have a great healthy eats option in Homewood! Thanks and keep up the great work!

name: Hollie Davison
text: Such a great and healthy way to eat. I will be coming back for more! The grounded and recoveries movie are my favourite. And quinoa salad is fabulous.

name: Michael McGrath
text: Love this place. Healthy food choices and great service, I come here often

name: Pat Staub
text: Ordered the vegan wrap, and it didn't disappoint. Very tasty!  Topped off with their delicious Beet-l juice. Friendly and fast service. So happy to have this around the corner from me.

name: Kenny Wayne
text: Today was my first time hearing about, and going to Kale Me Crazy.  I had the tuna wrap and it was easily the best one I've ever had in my life.

name: Jeff Gjurashaj
text: If you're going to be closed maked sure to put that on the website.  In case you didn't know people use the internet a lot.

name: J Barry
text: I've been three times and the wait time is unacceptable. The first two times I ordered a smoothie and it took over 10 minutes -- there was no one else in there! The last time I went it took over 20 minutes to get a sandwich wrap, and again it wasn't busy, but there was only one person working on food in the back. I found everything to taste good, but I won't be back because of this.

name: Jess Lewis
text: I love this restaurant so much! It's my go to place for a healthy meal or smoothie. The owner is absolutely wonderful as well

name: Christie Hoffmeyer
text: Excited to try something new, which caters to our vegetarian diet, we set our GPS to take us straight to Kale Me Crazy. The hours on Sunday are 9am - 6pm, so with it being 10:30, we were certain we were in for a treat. Disappointingly, they were closed with no signage on the door to indicate why. So glad we drove 20 minutes to find closed doors! This is a poor way to conduct business and several consumers were disappointed upon our arrival.

name: Cheryl Martin
text:
On my first visit, I ordered a smoothie without an ingredient I’m allergic to, but it was accidentally added. Luckily the staff realized before I drank the whole thing, and I was able to minimize my reaction in time. The owner was made aware, and after we spoke he offered for me to come meet him, and enjoy my second experience on the house. He expressed his concern for the mistake, and was clear on his intentions from keeping it from happening again. He is very enthusiastic about his business, and sharing how good nutrition can enrich your life.
Everything I’ve had from this restaurant has been delicious. Even the juices are mixed so well that I’m sure anyone can find at least one they like. They make eating healthy fun with wonderful staff and nice atmosphere, as well as making highly nutritious foods that taste great. My current line up of favorites are the wheatgrass shot, kale yeah juice, and the quinoa bowl. They offer so much more than just kale. Give it a try and support your local business as well as your health and taste buds!
